A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have now see this movie twice as I had mixed feelings after the first viewing. Although the action scenes were amazing this film falls short on what I have come to expect from a Star Wars movie. Maybe I need to accept that nothing will ever compare to Empire Strikes Back. The things that bothered me the most about TLJ were the out of place jokes and puns that will not withstand the test of time. Star Wars was funny because jokes like\, “I would rather kiss the Wookie” made sense in a galaxy far far away...
